metadata.title: CVE-2024-45492 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in libexpat before 2.6.3. nextScaffoldPart inxmlparse.c can have an integer overflow for m_groupSize on 32-bit platforms(where UINT_MAX equals SIZE_MAX).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-45492` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

expat - 2.2.9-1ubuntu0.7
libexpat1 - 2.2.9-1ubuntu0.7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: expat package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.2.9-1ubuntu0.7').
xmlrpc-c package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
wbxml2 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
